00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_UNWRAP_RANGE_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_UNWRAP_RANGE_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/range/begin.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/range/end.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/range/iterator.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/range/iterator_range.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/unwrap/iterator.hpp>
00018 
00019 // Note : In Boost.Assign.v2, this is deprecated but it could be used 
00020 // elsewhere.
00021 
00022 
00023 // See iterator.hpp
00024 
00025 namespace boost{
00026 namespace assign{ 
00027 namespace v2{
00028 namespace ref{
00029 namespace unwrap_aux{
00030 
00031         template<typename R>
00032     struct is_range : is_unwrapped_iterator<
00033         typename boost::range_iterator<R>::type
00034     >{};
00035 
00036 // TODO remove
00037 // I guess this is subsumed by range_reference
00038 //    template<typename R>
00039 //    struct reference_of_unwrapped_range
00040 //     : unwrap::reference_of_iterator<
00041 //         typename boost::range_iterator<R>::type
00042 //     >{};
00043 
00044     template<typename R, bool = unwrap_aux::is_range<R>::value>
00045     struct result_of_unwrap_range
00046     {
00047         typedef typename boost::range_iterator<R>::type base_it_;
00048         typedef typename result_of::unwrap_iterator<base_it_>::type it_;
00049         typedef boost::iterator_range<it_> type;
00050 
00051         static type call( R& r){
00052             return type(
00053                 ref::unwrap_iterator( boost::begin( r ) ),
00054                 ref::unwrap_iterator( boost::end( r ) )
00055             );
00056         }
00057     };
00058 
00059     // No need to unwrap twice
00060     template<typename R>
00061     struct result_of_unwrap_range<R,true>
00062     {
00063         typedef R type; // don't change this to R&
00064         static type call( R& r){ return r; }
00065     };
00066 
00067 }// unwrap_aux
00068 
00069         template<typename R>
00070     struct is_unwrapped_range : unwrap_aux::is_range<R>{};
00071 
00072 namespace result_of{
00073 
00074         template<typename R>
00075     struct unwrap_range : unwrap_aux::result_of_unwrap_range<R>{};
00076 
00077 }// result_of
00078 
00079     template<typename R>
00080     typename result_of::unwrap_range<R>::type 
00081     unwrap_range( R& r)
00082     {    
00083         typedef result_of::unwrap_range<R> result_;
00084         return result_::call( r );
00085     }
00086 
00087     template<typename R>
00088     typename result_of::unwrap_range<R const>::type 
00089     unwrap_range( R const& r)
00090     {    
00091         typedef result_of::unwrap_range<R const> result_;
00092         return result_::call( r );
00093     }
00094 
00095 }// ref
00096 }// v2
00097 }// assign
00098 }// boost
00099 
00100 #endif
